entry.content:
We have a docs site now! It's built with Docusaurus ðŸ¦•.

Storybook served us well for a while, but with the growth and evolution of our Design System came the need for a platform where we could communicate better.

We had a good experience with Docusaurus on FrontHub, it has been meeting all the needs of the project and would meet all the needs of Tangram, so the decision to choose it was very easy.

You can join and contribute with the documentation, we have a complete tutorial with step by step.
